<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/claimable_balances/{claimable_balance_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The single claimable balance endpoint provides information on a claimable balance.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"claimable_balance_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"A unique identifier for this claimable balance.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
